iad.rockyno.de

ROCKY-IAD node is powered by Rocky Linux.

This image presents a conceptual blend of cloud computing and the Washington DC skyline. In the foreground, prominent landmarks like the Capitol Building and the Washington Monument are clearly visible. Above these landmarks, a large, ethereal cloud formation dominates the sky. Integrated within this cloud are several semi-transparent, cube-shaped containers, symbolizing cloud computing and storage solutions. These containers emit a soft glow and are filled with intricate digital elements such as circuit patterns and flowing data streams. The sky is painted with gentle hues of dawn, featuring soft pinks, blues, and purples, adding a serene yet futuristic ambiance to the overall scene.

Rocky-IAD node built with:

Container Deployments

Container Orchestration

All containers orchestrated with Coolify.

This image also merges the concept of cloud computing with the Washington DC backdrop. It features a striking scene where the Washington DC skyline, including the Capitol Building and the Washington Monument, is set against a backdrop of a majestic cloud formation. Suspended within this cloud are numerous cube-shaped containers, semi-transparent and glowing, representative of cloud computing technologies. The containers are detailed with digital motifs, including circuit-like designs and streams of data. The color palette of this image is composed of the tranquil shades of dawn, with a mixture of pink, blue, and purple tones, creating a calm yet technologically advanced atmosphere.
In the Cloud.
ROCKY-IAD node hosted on the Linode Platform with Rocky Linux 9.
SSL certificates.
All digital certificates needed to enable HTTPS (SSL/TLS) handled by Let's Encrypt.
Automations.
IT automation with Ansible for software provisioning, configuration management, and application deployment functionality.
Decoupled Architecture.
Drupal and WordPress (headless). Astro and SvelteKit (front-end development).
API Development.
JSON:API and REST API.
DevOps Stack.
Ansible, GitHub Actions, Docker, Kubernetes, Prometheus.
